name: Meme Museum
description:
Welcome to meme museum. This museum is a virtual meme experience. Through your computer, you can walk through it to travel back through time and see how the wonderful, funny, crazy and even dark world of memes has evolved. Enter 4 different eras of memes and click on them to learn how and where memes developed on their way to becoming a cultural phenomenon.

How to play:

  • Download and unzip the "Museum.zip" file below.
  • Open "Museum.exe".
  • Use arrow keys to move forward/backward and turn left/right.
  • Use mouse to turn around.
  • Press F when standing in front of a meme to show descriptions.
  • You can also post to the discussion board below and chat with others!
  • If you cannot open the file, watch a walkthrough: 

If you want to see your own memes in our museum, you can 

  • generate your memes at https://imgflip.com/memegenerator
  • email jeremigarcya@g.ucla.edu
  • in less than 24 hours, you will see your memes in the museum!

Teams:

  • Kelly Cheng
    • Set up model in Unreal Engine 4 (UE4)
    • Build collision & time traveling (level streaming)
    • Set up introduction and description
  • Jeremi Garcia
    • Research on memes
    • Import memes to UE4
    • Build interactive element in UE4
  • Ann Suzuki
    • Research on memes
    • Categorize memes into five exhibits
    • Write text for respective memes
